And one thing i can honesty say is that rodney really does love me. He has always been honest with me. He may be a jerk but he always had reason to me. He did get alittle spycho at times but we all do. He was going thru so much. and i didn't care. I told him i would never leave him and i left when he needed me most. That makes me feel so terrible. I wish people would just stop hating him and think of him as areal person that i really did fall inlove wtih and understand our relationship alittle. And I know i shouldn't have told people when i was mad at him cuz now everyone hates him. I should have just kept my mouth shut and my opinions to myself and maybe we'd still be happy. Maybe brandon would still have a chance at a real family. I never wanted this for him. He deserves a father. He deserves so much more than i have given him. I love him so much that it hurts. I can't even immagine my life without my little punkn. But at the same time, i don't know if i can immagine my life without rodney. 
i thought i was over him but if i am why does this hurt so much. I cried for hours last night. I just look at brandon and i start tearing up. Its so hard to look at someone so beautiful and innocent that you created with someone who isn't gonna be part of the wonder you made together. I don't know if this makes any sence to anyone else. Its just a bunch of random thoughts in my head. 
I swear i tried soooo hard to make things work. I gave up my life. But now i still feel guilty. I neve went to see him. He was all alone in the apt for three months without a word from me. I feel such guilt for what i've put us all thru. I wish it would jsut go away. I wish i didn't feel sadness, empt, lonely, scared, confused, and hurt all the time. Theres so much rain in my life right now. Seems like everytime i think things are getting better something gets in the way. Something holds me back from being happy. From being the person i once was. I wish i could change it. Its the first time i can look myself in the mirror and say that i honestly regret something...
Not rodney, just the past. Just all I have done. I want to make it right, but i just don't know how
